description: No matter what, just replies "I don't know what to say"
This app is useless, not able to get any simple info.... like educational, gravity force and all. Even i have changed many preferences. Developers please look into this.
Everything works, thanks to the author.
Not maintained. Doesn't support ChatGPT.
Slow to produce answers but works great on Mobile devices and phones. Good job

It uses a chinese copy (BAI chat), so I wouldn't insert anything sensitive there. But it's great for most general-use promps and works wonderfully :P

Looks great and integrates well with Gnome!

Very nice app with multiple AI options (chatgpt 3.5 turbo, gpt4, bai chat ...). They all give different answers, which provides different points of views for the same question. This app is very new, so it is still very rudimentary. But the foundations are great already. Big thumb up!
summary: Very nice app with multiple AI options

description: I love this app, it's great, however after the recent update, it crashes after every second prompt. But I do like the extra features.

I am excited to see where this goes and it is really cool to have a AI Chatbot in the GNOME HID. I get crashes with all of the models and my API key is never saved. Its still a young project so with time it might be better.

- Crash right after first input
- Nonobvious configuration. What is "Cat GPT" in configuration? How can I use my credentials for GPT v3?

This really ticked me! I was quite impressed with the
applicatilon. It has a very natural feeling to it.
I didn't find it slow as in other reviews.
Thank you for your effort.
Short terms.. bit slow in terminations
very good fun, interesting.
Sure you get a couple few tries, but after that you have to "Log in with an API token" but it gives no option to do this.
summary: Have to log in with nothing

description: It still does not work

Does not compute.
No response to any of my prompts.
Terrible interface.
Good app, works great
None of the providers are currently working for me (20.8.23), there is no output text or output ends abruptly. Was great before.

I've been using this app regularly since it came out. It flat-out doesn't work in most scenarios. I actually think it worked better a month ago. 

Right now, the focus seems to be ironing out the UI kinks. Which I understand is an important part of a successful program. Hopefully, when everyone is satisfied with the look-and-feel, the focus can shift more towards backend issues. BAIChat no longer works, API keys aren't acknoledged and the latest version is broken on Fedora. This app needs serious work, but I have hope that it can find its footing. It's still a very new project.

This app could be the pipe dream that AI nerds long for. Desktop AI app, no browser neccesary, fully integrated with the rest of my system. Currently though, I would only use this if you have a local AI install.
summary: Barely works, but keep your eyes peeled for improvement

description: Works very well, and is very fast. I would love to see open-llama added though.
summary: Works very well, I would love to see open-llama added

description: Sure you can ask very simple questions and have short conversations, but at the moment it's not that good. For example , I asked it to provide me 10 frequent used words in English and all it could answer was "adverb". Then I asked it to make a list and the response was "I'll make a list of things I'd like to do before I d1e".

It's not recognizing my open ai keys, it says all the time that my account doesn't include that model. I'm already using the same keys in neovim, vscode, llm command line tools, etc, and with credits on a full account.

Trying to use the `local` model, then set the `gpt-3.5-turbo-1106` as a model this app simple forgets (it becomes blank after saving and closing the preferences window). The "bot" says that I didn't selected any model, even after going to the hamburguer menu and selecting local.

So I can't use this app right now, apparently even after configuring everything inside preferences it appears to ignore it.
Love the models available also, makes everything nice and easy
It's a well made app, but the response is too short and unappropriate sometimes.

At the time of writing, out of the box, this "just works" in the sense that it will open up a chat window and let you start having useful conversations with AI via LLMs.

It provides a good interface for hooking it up to different AI models. Running some models locally is beyond the scope of this application and requires some other tools and commands.

I suspect that similar to some other apps (like Speech Note) we will gain the ability to run more complex models locally as the packaging and glue needed to make it work on various hardware improves.

Supports many APIs for Language models.

Some may be restricted, you may need custom API keys for them.

Also some features can break due to how the providers want their services to be used.

Good to know: "Open AI" says to not store data used through their API, in contrast to their webapp

Flatpak blocks Desktop, had to restart with alt strg f4 (login) sudo reboot 0 By the way, be aware to which service you send your input data before you do it. Ask yourself who is running the service for which purpose.
Muy util, pero me gustaria saber como conseguir una Api Key
Me encanta que puedas elegir entre multiples proveedores
Приложение работает только с токеном из chat gpt и тут нет ничего бесплатного
Но почему-то не сохраняется настройка очистки поля вопроса. А в остальном все замечательно. Спасибо автору!
С версии 0.1.7, всё отлично. 👍
Мне всё нравится.
